meanings.sent1: The unvaried routine of waking up, eating breakfast, and going to work every day can become boring.
meanings.sent2: The sky remained unvaried, with the same clear blue color from morning till night.
meanings.sent3: His unvaried choice of outfit, a plain white t-shirt and jeans, made his friends tease him about his lack of fashion sense.
meanings.sent4: The unvaried rhythm of the waves crashing against the shore was like a soothing lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The unvaried landscape of the desert stretched out endlessly, with nothing but sand dunes as far as the eye could see.

meanings.sent1: The unvaried menu at the cafeteria consisted of the same three dishes every day.
meanings.sent2: Her wardrobe was unvaried, filled only with black and white clothing.
meanings.sent3: The unvaried selection of movies on TV made it hard to find something interesting to watch.
meanings.sent4: The unvaried color scheme of the room, all shades of gray, gave it a dull and monotonous look.
meanings.sent5: The unvaried sound of the clock ticking in the room created a sense of time standing still.
